post.title: th-42pz70ba
post.content: hi. i have a panasonic plasma th-42pz70ba which had developed a fault, but is now repaired by myself, but i need the latest firmware to stop the fault returning! it's a known fault. 7 blinks. i have replaced the transistor on the scan board and the tv is working fine but i need a firmware upgrade. i contacted panasonic but they dont provide the firmware to the public. any help would be greatly appreciated, tia.
